name: OGRE Github
body: # Relevant information * [Differences to the Bitbucket Version](https://github.com/OGRECave/ogre/blob/master/git-ChangeLog.md) * [Up-to-date API documentation](https://ogrecave.github.io/ogre/api/1.10/) * [Doxygen based Manual](https://ogrecave.github.io/ogre/api/1.10/manual.html) * [Basic Emscripten Demo](https://ogrecave.github.io/ogre/emscripten/) ## OpenGL RenderSystem Comparisons * [GL vs GL3Plus](https://ogrecave.github.io/ogre/gl_status/TestResults_GL3Plus.html) * [GL vs GLES2](https://ogrecave.github.io/ogre/gl_status/TestResults_GLES2.html) * [GLES2 vs GL3Plus (outdated)](https://ogrecave.github.io/ogre/gl_status/gles2vsgl3plus.html) # Useful Add-Ons * [Blender Exporter](https://github.com/OGRECave/blender2ogre) * [Syntax highlighting for Ogre Scripts for Atom](https://github.com/OGRECave/language-ogre-script) * [Particle Universe](https://github.com/OGRECave/particleuniverse)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
